name: Mini Traveler
description:
Hi

Here I want to show my little project, which I finally completed. This is a small demo for now, from which I would like to receive feedback and feedback on how interesting the project is for you.

I put it together by myself, being inspired by old games

Movement is standard, on the WASD keys

LMB - blow,

RMB - damage block

E - interaction with interactive objects

This project so far takes only 2-3 minutes, but this is just the beginning.

Waiting for your feedback)

You can also follow my work there: https://vk.com/grivamor
